memberdef.name: errorList
memberdef.initializer:
{ { MS_NO_ERROR, 0, 0 },
{ NO_NOTE_SELECTED, "s1", TR("No note selected:
Please select a note and retry
") }, { NO_CHORD_REST_SELECTED, "s2", TR("No chord/rest selected:
Please select a chord or rest and retry") }, { NO_LYRICS_SELECTED, "s3", TR("No note or lyrics selected:
Please select a note or lyrics and retry") }, { NO_NOTE_REST_SELECTED, "s4", TR("No note or rest selected:
Please select a note or rest and retry") }, { NO_NOTE_SLUR_SELECTED, "s5", TR("No note or slur selected:
Please select a note or slur and retry") }, { NO_STAFF_SELECTED, "s6", TR("No staff selected:
Please select one or more staves and retry
") }, { NO_NOTE_FIGUREDBASS_SELECTED, "s7", TR("No note or figured bass selected:
Please select a note or figured bass and retry") },
{ CANNOT_INSERT_TUPLET, "t1", TR("Cannot insert chord/rest in tuplet") }, { CANNOT_SPLIT_TUPLET, "t2", TR("Cannot split tuplet") }, { CANNOT_SPLIT_MEASURE_FIRST_BEAT, "m1", TR("Cannot split measure here:
" "First beat of measure") }, { CANNOT_SPLIT_MEASURE_TUPLET, "m2", TR("Cannot split measure here:
" "Cannot split tuplet") },
{ NO_DEST, "p1", TR("No destination to paste") }, { DEST_TUPLET, "p2", TR("Cannot paste into tuplet") }, { TUPLET_CROSSES_BAR, "p3", TR("Tuplet cannot cross barlines") }, { DEST_LOCAL_TIME_SIGNATURE, "p4", TR("Cannot paste in local time signature") }, { DEST_TREMOLO, "p5", TR("Cannot paste in tremolo") }, { NO_MIME, "p6", TR("Nothing to paste") }, { DEST_NO_CR, "p7", TR("Destination is not a chord or rest") }, { CANNOT_CHANGE_LOCAL_TIMESIG, "l1", TR("Cannot change local time signature:
Measure is not empty") }, }
